p: With respect to the virome of Aedes aegypti and Culex mosquitoes in Ghana, mosquitoes collected in the Greater Accra region had a more diverse virome than mosquitoes from other regions in Ghana. In addition, all four indigenes reported to have possibly acquired infections locally were residents of the Greater Accra region, raising concerns about DENV transmission in the region [ 53, 54]. However, it is necessary to consider the possible role of the detected ISVs in the cycle of events.
